Description:
Summary Description:

IN STRICT CONSIDERATION OF THE PHILOSOPHY - "DO THE RIGHT THING" vs. "DO 'THE THING' RIGHT"

Title 2: DBA 1| DCL | REVIEW | Audit Role Security - bibaoprodazadb1.bibapollodb (Week 1)
Description:
Summary Description of Change:

As a Database Administrator (DBA), I want to ensure that the databases I am responsible for supporting adhere to the "CIA" principles of Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability.  
In order to ensure that permissions are not inadvertently over-provisioned, review Database Role security attributes to validate that they remain adherent to the principle of least privilege.

Review with solution SMEs

Title 2: DBA 1| SECURITY | REVIEW | Vulnerability Assessment Scans (Week 1)
Description:
Summary Description of Change:
As a Database Administrator (DBA), I want to ensure that the databases I am responsible for supporting adhere to the "CIA" principles of Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability.  

In Azure SQL Database, scrutinize built-in vulnerability assessment scans for obscure misconfigurations like weak encryption protocols or exposed system views, prioritize high-severity items for remediation, and assured compliance with regulatory standards. Share results with security stakeholders and reference related PBIs for automated scan integrations in CI/CD.

Title 2: DBA 2| CONFIG | REVIEW | Automatic Tuning Settings - bibaoprodazadb1.bibapollodb (Week 1)
Description:
Summary Description of Change:
As a Database Administrator (DBA), I want to ensure that the databases I am responsible for supporting adhere to the "CIA" principles of Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability.  

In Azure SQL Database, regularly review the automatic tuning configurations (such as force plan or automatic index creation) to verify they're enabled appropriately for the workload, bringing to light any that could introduce unintended query regressions or over-indexing, and present recommendations to solution SMEs for fine-tuning / disablement.

Title 2: DBA 2| DBCC | TRACEON | Review Diagnostic Flags (Week 1)
Description:
Summary Description of Change:

As a Database Administrator (DBA), I want to ensure that the databases I am responsible for supporting adhere to the "CIA" principles of Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability.  

Trace flags are used to set specific server characteristics, alter particular behaviors, and diagnose performances issues.

NOTE: This applies only to SQL Server Instances, and Azure SQL Managed Instances.  In Azure SQL Database, DBCC TRACEON / Trace Flags are not supported.

Title 2: DBA 3| DBCC | CHECKDB | Integrity Consistency - bibaoprodazadb1.bibapollodb (Week 1)
Description:
Summary Description of Change:

As a Database Administrator (DBA), I want to ensure that the databases I am responsible for supporting adhere to the "CIA" principles of Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability.  

This task entails executing the DBCC CHECKDB console command against a copy of critical databases to verify the logical and physical integrity of all the objects within the database, validates the contents of every indexed view in the database, and validates the link-level consistency between table metadata and system locations when storing varbinary(max) data.

Title 2: DBA 3| DBCC | CHECKDB | Integrity Consistency - bibaoprodazadb1.bibapollodb (Week 2)
Description:
Summary Description of Change:

Title 2: DBA 3| DBCC | CHECKDB | Integrity Consistency - bibaoprodazadb1.bibapollodb (Week 3)
Description:
Summary Description of Change:

As a Database Administrator (DBA), I want to ensure that the databases I am responsible for supporting adhere to the "CIA" principles of Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability.  

This task entails executing the DBCC CHECKDB console command against a copy of critical databases to verify the logical and physical integrity of all the objects within the database, validates the contents of every indexed view in the database, and validates the link-level consistency between table metadata and system locations when storing varbinary(max) data.

Title 2: DBA 3| DDL | REBUILD | Index Rebuild - bibaoprodazadb1.bibapollodb (Week 1)
Description:
Summary Description of Change:

In addition to automated Azure SQL Database maintenance tasks, specifically to increase page density, reduce database space, and consequently keep a database within its pricing tier's size limit, indexes should periodically be rebuilt.

In order to ensure that queries, processes, and routines that are executed against a database are as performant as possible, execute INDEX REORGANIZATION (which are an online operation) against critical database objects.

Title 2: DBA 3| DDL | UPDATE | Rebuild Statistics - bibaoprodazadb1.bibapollodb (Week 1)
Description:
Summary Description of Change:

As a Database Administrator (DBA), I want to ensure that the databases I am responsible for supporting adhere to the "CIA" principles of Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability.  
In order to ensure that queries, routines, and processes executed against objects within a critical database are as performant as possible, the statistics that are gathered during database operations should be rebuilt in light of the constantly changing state of a database.

NOTE: Table Variables do not generate statistics.  Therefore, when query plans are generated and referred to during database operations, any historical use of table variables is not considered.  Datasets that vary in size, and are stored in Table Variables should be expected to have wildly varying performance characteristics over time.

Title 2: DBA 3| DDL | UPDATE | Rebuild Statistics - bibaoprodazadb1.bibapollodb (Week 2)
Description:
Summary Description of Change:

As a Database Administrator (DBA), I want to ensure that the databases I am responsible for supporting adhere to the "CIA" principles of Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability.  
In order to ensure that queries, routines, and processes executed against objects within a critical database are as performant as possible, the statistics that are gathered during database operations should be rebuilt in light of the constantly changing state of a database.

NOTE: Table Variables do not generate statistics.  Therefore, when query plans are generated and referred to during database operations, any historical use of table variables is not considered.  Datasets that vary in size, and are stored in Table Variables should be expected to have wildly varying performance characteristics over time.

Title 2: DBA 4| DMOs | REVIEW | Query Parameterization Behavior - bibaoprodazadb1.bibapollodb (Week 1)
Description:
Summary Description of Change:
As a Database Administrator (DBA), I want to ensure that the databases I am responsible for supporting adhere to the "CIA" principles of Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability.  

In Azure SQL Database, regularly analyze DMV insights on forced parameterization settings to detect obscure parameter sniffing issues that lead to inconsistent query plans, evaluate if database-level forced parameterization should be toggled, and collaborate with SMEs on adjustments without altering application code.

Description:
Summary Description of Change: 

As a Database Administrator (DBA), I want to ensure that the databases I am responsible for supporting adhere to the "CIA" principles of Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability.

In order to ensure that the principle of least-privilege is followed within the database environment, DML statements are submitted to the DBA team within the Fresh ticketing system, and executed on behalf of the submitter after review by a DBA.
